analysis.key_quote: Giving any individual too much power and control, no matter what political party happens to be in power at the time, erodes the abilities of the system as a whole.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the instability and unpredictability that the proposed rule would introduce, emphasizing the need for a stable and accountable federal government. This aligns with opposition to the rule, particularly regarding the potential for politicization and erosion of merit-based governance.
